concept.title: Running Adam from Eclipse
concept.shortdesc: How to use Eclipse to run .

conbody.section:
To use Eclipse to run use the menu
File Export

Select Javadoc to export
After selection Javadoc, configure the Doclet. At this point you can select if you want private and public classes and members checked.
Eclipse Setup
Configure the location of the Docfacto.xml file for
Eclipse Docfacto.xml config
Pressing the finish button at this stage will run
